titleStmt.title: To the Right Honorable the Lords assembled in High Court of Parliament: the humble remonstrance and petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common Councell assembled. Together with their Lordships answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, for John Bellamie.,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary order to print.
The answer of the Lords is dated 26 May 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
